item.name: System Info
item.description: uname -a system info 系统信息

item.name: Number Of Logged In Users
item.description: 系统用户登录数 Number Of Logged In Users

template.name: Template Net Huawei VRP SNMPv2
template.description: Template Net Huawei VRP version: 0.15 Overview: Reference: https://www.slideshare.net/Huanetwork/huawei-s5700-naming-conventions-and-port-numbering-conventions Reference: http://support.huawei.com/enterprise/KnowledgebaseReadAction.action?contentId=KB1000090234 MIBs used: HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB ENTITY-MIB

trigger_prototype.name: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Fan is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

discovery_rule.name: MPU Discovery
discovery_rule.description: http://support.huawei.com/enterprise/KnowledgebaseReadAction.action?contentId=KB1000090234. Filter limits results to Main Processing Units

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB The temperature for the {#SNMPVALUE}.

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: CPU utilization
item_prototype.description: MIB: HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB The CPU usage for this entity. Generally, the CPU usage will calculate the overall CPU usage on the entity, and itis not sensible with the number of CPU on the entity. Reference: http://support.huawei.com/enterprise/KnowledgebaseReadAction.action?contentId=KB1000090234

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Memory utilization
item_prototype.description: MIB: HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB The memory usage for the entity. This object indicates what percent of memory are used. Reference: http://support.huawei.com/enterprise/KnowledgebaseReadAction.action?contentId=KB1000090234

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Net Huawei VRP SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber[entPhysicalSerialNum.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1 and {Template Net Huawei VRP SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber[entPhysicalSerialNum.{#SNMPINDEX}].strlen()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available
